document.full_text: bank of america said it has hired gary lynch, a former director of enforcement at the u.s. securities and exchange commission, to head its legal, compliance, and regulatory relations efforts.
document.title: bank of america hires ex-sec official gary lynch
lines_and_colors: bank of america said it has hired gary lynch, a former director of enforcement at the u.s. securities and exchange commission, to head its legal, compliance, and regulatory relations efforts.
